call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - February 27th

decisions.decision: Changed the call name from 'Ergo AMA' to 'Ergo ecosystem weekly AMA'
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: Feedback from Sigmanauts in Hong Kong that 'Ergo AMA' sounds strange since it's a protocol with no controlling party
decisions.quote: Ergo ecosystem is then quite better, right, in this regard

decisions.decision: Removed the words 'official repository' from the GitHub repository
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: The term 'official' is unclear and confusing when anyone can fork the code
decisions.quote: At some point I also removed the words official repository, because it's the same problem

commitments.commitment: Launch Dexy Gold UI in coming days or weeks after resolving storage rent issue
commitments.quote: Hopefully we can launch well in coming days, weeks

commitments.commitment: Resolve storage rent issue for SigmaUSD bank box, take last look and generate more tests for Dexy Gold
commitments.timeline: one day, one and a half
commitments.quote: the plan, you know, is to, well, resolve storage rent issue for SigmaUSD bank box and then yeah well I can issue take last look and generate with AI some more tests for Dexy Gold but yeah that's just I don't know like one day one and a half

open_questions.question: How to get different ecosystem entities in sync and represent Ergo collectively
open_questions.context: Need to coordinate between commercial players like Zengate, non-profits like Sigmanauts and Ergo Foundation, and community organizations

open_questions.question: Issues with kushti's voting in the developers DAO
open_questions.context: First voting is active but kushti is having some issues with his voting

key_facts.fact: Security audit of 6.0 by Dusek found quite a lot of issues, especially around versioning, including non-trivial DOS possibilities
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: First voting is active in the developers DAO with distributed keys
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Talks with MEXC started in 2019 with 5 Bitcoin, finally resulted in community fundraiser for 40k-60k total
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Ergo is now under radar of many entities including Bitcoin OG whales, big Middle East funds, and Chinese funds since second half of 2024
key_facts.speaker: kushti
